resources.string: It Seems You Are %s. We Got You!
Currently Playing The %s Mix For Ya.
Available Playlists Will Be Displayed Below:
Capture The Vibes, Feel The Energy, And Let The Tunes Work Their Magic!
We Apologize, It Seems We Were Not Able To Determine How You Are Feeling Right Now. Would You Like To Go Back And Try Again Or Tell Us How Are You Currently Feeling?

Please Place Your Finger On The Fingerprint Image And Keep It There Until The Measurement Is Complete.\n Keep Your Finger Steady For Accurate Results.
